To whom it may concern:

As an experienced and determined worker in customer service. I am answering your ad because I can offer your company abilities, talents, and enthusiasm.

I have been in the Customer Service business for more than 9 years with constant enthusiasm for giving the customer an unforgettable experience. I strive for the best and obtain as much experience as possible to continue to advance in my job. I am able to problem solve with customers to make sure they are satisfied with their visit. I also have time management skills and attendance with a clean driving record and clean background as well as a reliable vehicle. I have been a supporter of marijuana for 8 years and it has been a passion to be able to be behind the counter.  

I appreciate your time and I look forward to hearing from you. I can be reached at the number listed above, at your convenience.

Sincerely,

    Kathleen Graham
